title: Part a. [0–1]
stimulusHtml:
1 point (1/2 for identification and 1/2 for explanation)

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in machines.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more machines using the same amount of resources.
descriptions:
Earns 0 of 1 point

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in machines.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more machines using the same amount of resources.

Earns 1 of 1 point

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in machines.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more machines using the same amount of resources.

title: Part b. [0–1]
stimulusHtml:
1 point: (1/2 for identification and 1/2 for explanation)

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in food.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more food using the same amount of resources.
descriptions:
Earns 0 of 1 point.

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in food.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more food using the same amount of resources.

Earns 1 of 1 point.

  • 1/2 point - Luna has the absolute advantage in food.

  • 1/2 point - Because it can produce more food using the same amount of resources.

title: Part c. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • 1 point - Luna has a comparative advantage in machines.

  • 1 point - Because it has a lower opportunity cost than Ashna.
descriptions:
Earns 0 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna has a comparative advantage in machines.

  • 1 point - Because it has a lower opportunity cost than Ashna.

Earns 1 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna has a comparative advantage in machines.

  • 1 point - Because it has a lower opportunity cost than Ashna.

Earns 2 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna has a comparative advantage in machines.

  • 1 point - Because it has a lower opportunity cost than Ashna.

title: Part d. [0–2]
stimulusHtml:
2 points

  • 1 point - Luna will import food.

  • 1 point - Because it has a higher opportunity cost of producing food, and Ashna has a comparative advantage in producing food.
descriptions:
Earns 0 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna will import food.

  • 1 point - Because it has a higher opportunity cost of producing food, and Ashna has a comparative advantage in producing food.

Earns 1 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna will import food.

  • 1 point - Because it has a higher opportunity cost of producing food, and Ashna has a comparative advantage in producing food.

Earns 2 of 2 points

  • 1 point - Luna will import food.

  • 1 point - Because it has a higher opportunity cost of producing food, and Ashna has a comparative advantage in producing food.

title: Part e. [0–1]
stimulusHtml: 1 point: Any figure between pre-trade domestic opportunity costs is acceptable. Note that Luna would pay between 1/3 and 1 machine per unit of food: F = 1/3 to 1 M, and Ashna would pay between 1 and 3 units of food per machine: M = 1 to 3 F. Acceptable answers thus include 1M = 1.5 F, 1M = 1.75 F; 1F= 1/2M, etc.
descriptions:
No point earned.

1 point: Any figure between pre-trade domestic opportunity costs is acceptable. Note that Luna would pay between 1/3 and 1 machine per unit of food: F = 1/3 to 1 M, and Ashna would pay between 1 and 3 units of food per machine: M = 1 to 3 F. Acceptable answers thus include 1M = 1.5 F, 1M = 1.75 F; 1F= 1/2M, etc.

Earns 1 point: Any figure between pre-trade domestic opportunity costs is acceptable. Note that Luna would pay between 1/3 and 1 machine per unit of food: F = 1/3 to 1 M, and Ashna would pay between 1 and 3 units of food per machine: M = 1 to 3 F. Acceptable answers thus include 1M = 1.5 F, 1M = 1.75 F; 1F= 1/2M, etc.
